full_summary:
# BATS-D and AN-PRC-161 Cables

## Notification

The Department of National Defence is soliciting responses to an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the procurement of Battlefield Awareness and Targeting System-Dismounted (BATS-D) handheld AN/PRC-161 radios and AN-PRC-161/BATS-D hotshoe cables. The contract will support the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) Tactical Air Control Party (TACP) capability.

## Summary

The Government of Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities in response to this ACAN. Bidders will be required to meet specific requirements outlined in the notice, which can be downloaded from [CanadaBids website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8267/w8485-247820-acan_with_option_bats-d_radio_and_cable_advance_contract_award_notice_en.pdf).

## Goods and Services Required

* BATS-D handheld AN/PRC-161 radios (Quantity: 5)
* AN-PRC-161/BATS-D hotshoe cables (Quantity: 5)
	+ Additionally, there is an option for one new radio and cable each year for four years after the initial contract award.

## Contact Information

Capt. Kyle Grenier
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 1K2
kyle.grenier@forces.gc.ca, (819) 939-7031

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Notice Details

* Solicitation Number: W8485-247820
* Reference Number: cb-8267-29477585
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: August 18, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 5, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 11, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

## UNSPSC Classification

* Communications Devices and Accessories (43190000)

## Notice Type

Advance Contract Award Notice

## Procurement Category

Goods and Services (GD)

## Regions of Delivery

National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contact for Inquiries

Capt. Kyle Grenier, Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 1K2
